title: Repulze v1.0.4
description:
Get ready for the futuristic adrenaline rush from the developers of Reckless Racing!

This action racer puts you in the seat of experimental Repulze hovercraft working as a test pilot for the Man. Well, the Synthetic Man is more accurate. The Synthetics run the corporations.
